channel.title: Adding shops :)
channel.description:
Ok so i found shops.cfg, i can't seem to access .cfg files so i changed it into a .txt file, i added a shop name tabbed and stuff, but where would i find the shop ingame because there was nothing that said x/y coords?'
Also, how/if i can, can i access cfg files anywaY? or do i not need to convert this txt file back to cfg?
This is what i added shop = 1 Test 1 1 1 1

item.title: Adding shops :)
item.dc:creator: @jeddac jeddac
item.description:
@jeddac wrote:

I have lots of
}
else if (NPCID == 1305) { // Agnar Food Shop
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 30; //Aubury Magic Shop

Ok lemme rephrase it

I make a shop with
shop = 1 Testrunes 1 1 1 1
in shops .cfg

(Shop id Name Sell Buy Item Amount)

That would mean shop id 1 which i would put as

WanneShop=1; //Testrunes?

If not can you explain,

Also 1 1 1 1 would mean it would?

Sell 1 item Buy 1 item Item ID then amount of that item?
